import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Row, Col, Form as FormBS } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./form.scss"; import closeicon from "../../assets/Dell_light.png"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const Form = ({ show, setShow }) => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: "", dateOfBirth: "", eyeColour: "", hairColour: "", gender: "female", house: "Gryffindor", hogwartsStudent: true, image: "", }); const [errorName, setErrorName] = useState(""); const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (form.name.trim() === "") { setErrorName("Ingresa un nombre"); return; } }; return ( Agrega un personaje handleForm(e)}> Nombre { setErrorName(""); handleChange(e); }} /> {errorName} Cumpleaños handleChange(e)} /> Color de Ojos handleChange(e)} /> Color de Pelo handleChange(e)} /> Casa Color de Pelo handleChange(e)} /> Género
handleChange(e)} defaultChecked={true} /> handleChange(e)} /> Posición
handleChange(e)} defaultChecked={true} /> handleChange(e)} /> ); }; export default Form;
